about_the_game:
An additional scenario for "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Awakening."

After Nobunaga's death, Hideyoshi Hashiba, who had defeated Akechi and Shibata, became the real successor to the Oda clan.
The nominal head of the clan, Nobukatsu Oda, opposed this and joined with Ieyasu Tokugawa, who had control of 5 counties.
Monkey vs. Raccoon Dog, a battle between two heroes of the sengoku period was about to erupt.

▼Additional scenario
Battle of Komaki-Nagakute

▼How to play
Select "NEW GAME" and at the scenario selection screen, select "Battle of Komaki-Nagakute" to play.
